remarks: Layers are used to encapsulate game entities and components with the purpose of building the game scene.

properties.name: engine
properties.description: The [Engine](/documentation/Engine) that the layer belongs to.

properties.name: redraw
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the layer should be redrawn when the next frame is rendered.

properties.name: static
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the layer is static and should only be drawn once.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the layer is visible.

methods.name: addComponent
methods.description: Add a component that extends or shares the same interface as an [Entity](/documentation/Entity).

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draw the layer and all its components to the screen.

methods.name: drawFromCanvas
methods.description: Draw an image from a HTML5 canvas to the layer.

methods.name: drawImage
methods.description: Draw an image to the layer.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Load all the components registered to the layer.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Call the update method for all the registered components.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
